Aurelia With Attribute.description: The element will now be in scope rather than accessing through property e.g. ${object.test} -> with.bind -> ${test}

Aurelia Event.description: Binds a function to be called on the view model to the event e.g. click.delegate="clicked()"

Aurelia Bind.description: Binds a function to be called on the view model to the event e.g. click.delegate="clicked()"

Aurelia Repeat.description: Iterates over a collection>See here for more info

Aurelia Repeat By number.description: Iterates X times based on the numberOfTimesToRepeat *Useful for prototypes and mocking data or lazy loading

Aurelia Style Attribute.description: Allows binding a string, object, or array to a style attribute

Aurelia Show Attribute.description: Toggles a display none on the element

Aurelia View Model.description: Binds a particular view model to the html

Aurelia Compose.description: Allows to select the html and view model to run usually used in a dynamic scenario

Import.description: Allows importing of references in HTML

Aurelia As Custom Element.description: Makes a tag inerit the view model of the as custom element.
